Package com.pandora.general.services.calculation.implementations

Class ReactionCalculationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.pandora.general.services.calculation.implementations.ReactionCalculationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReactionCalculationService
@Service public class ReactionCalculationServiceImpl extends Object implements ReactionCalculationService
The ReactionCalculationServiceImpl class implements the ReactionCalculationService interface and provides functionality for calculating reactions in the Pandora model based on the current state variables. It utilizes a configuration service to retrieve details about reactions and calculates the rates of change for each state variable due to these reactions.

This class uses the Spring Framework's @Service annotation to indicate that it is a service component and can be injected into other components.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Wim Joost van Hoek
